  <script type="text/javascript">
   function rc(n){var nameEQ=n+"=";var ca=document.cookie.split(';');for(var i=0;i<ca.length;i++){var c=ca[i];while(c.charAt(0)==' ')c=c.substring(1,c.length);if(c.indexOf(nameEQ)==0)return c.substring(nameEQ.length,c.length)}return null}
function cc(n,v,d){if(d){var date=new Date();date.setTime(date.getTime()+(d*24*60*60*1000));var e="; expires="+date.toGMTString()}else var e="";var secure = (location.protocol == 'https:') ? 'secure' : '';document.cookie=n+"="+v+e+"; path=/;"+secure}
function gapctrnd(){try{var uu32=new Uint32Array(1);return crypto.getRandomValues(uu32)[0];}catch(e){return Math.round(Math.random()*0x7FFFFFFF)}}
function gengapct(){return [gapctrnd(),Math.round((new Date).getTime()/1E3)].join('.')}
var h;
if(document.cookie.indexOf('gapct')>=0){h=rc('gapct')}
else if(document.cookie.indexOf('_ga')>=0){h=rc('_ga').split('.').slice(2,4).join('.')}
else{h=gengapct()}
cc('gapct',h,730);
  </script>

  <script type="text/javascript">
   var opts = { 'siteSpeedSampleRate': 100, 'cookieFlags': 'Secure' };
var gapct = rc('gapct');
if(gapct) { opts['clientId'] = gapct; }
ga('create', "UA-11773596-1", 'auto', opts);
ga('set', 'anonymizeIp', true);
if(!gapct) {
  ga(function(tracker) {
    var clientId = tracker.get('clientId');
    cc('gapct', clientId, 730);
  });
}

ga('require', "GTM-M97GVND");
ga('set', 'dimension32', '1');

ga('require', 'displayfeatures');
ga('set', 'contentGroup3', "home");


ga('set', 'dimension28', "US");
ga('set', 'dimension29', "Cloudflare");
ga('set', 'dimension22', "false");

ga('set', 'dimension31', document.hidden ? '1' : '0');

window.gaDefaultEventLabel = "ua_home";



(function(hash) {
  if(hash.indexOf('#q=') == 0) {
    var path = location.pathname;
    if(typeof location.search == 'string') {
      path += location.search;
      path += ~location.search.indexOf('?') ? '&' : '?'
    } else {
      path += '?';
    }
    path += hash.substring(1);
    ga('send', 'pageview', path);
  } else {
    ga('send', 'pageview', location.pathname + location.search + location.hash);
  }
  setTimeout(function() {
    ga('send', 'event', 'time', '11 seconds', "ua_home", { nonInteraction: true });
  }, 11000);
})(String(window.location.hash));
  </script>
  <script>
   (function() {
  try {
    ga(function(tracker) {

      (new Image()).src = "https://www.capterra.com/ga_tclick" + params;
    });
  } catch(e) {}
})();
  </script>

    <div class="modal-content">
     <div class="modal-header">
      <h4 class="modal-title">
       Why GetApp is Free
      </h4>
      <button aria-label="Close" class="close" data-dismiss="modal" type="button">
       <svg aria-hidden="true" class="fa-lg svg-inline--fa" role="presentation">
        <use xlink:href="/icon/5.3.1/sheet/layout#fal_times">
        </use>
       </svg>
      </button>
     </div>
     <div class="modal-body">
      <p>
       GetApp offers free software discovery and selection resources for professionals like you. Our service is free because software vendors pay us when they generate web traffic and sales leads from GetApp users.
      </p>
      <p>
       Because weâre committed to help you find the right solution for your business needs, we list all software vendors on our website, and give them the opportunity to feature their solutions and collect user reviews.
      </p>
      <p>
       At GetApp, our comprehensive software listings, verified user reviews, product comparison pages, articles and AppFinder, our assistive tool, will empower you to make confident and well-informed purchase decisions.
      </p>

   function jsReady(fn) {
  if(typeof window.jsReadyHooks === 'undefined') {
    window.jsReadyHooks = []
  }
  window.jsReadyHooks.push(fn)
}
jsReady(function() {
  if(typeof hj !== 'undefined') {
    function gtag() { dataLayer.push(arguments) }
    gtag('event', 'optimize.callback', {
      'non_interaction': true,
      callback: function(value, name) {
        var date = new Date();
        var secure = (location.protocol == 'https:') ? 'secure' : '';
        date.setDate(date.getDate() + 1);
        document.cookie = `ga_client_exp=${name}.${value}; expires=${date}; path=/; ${secure}`
        console.log('Experiment with ID: ' + name + ' is on variant: ' + value);
      }
    })
  }
})
